Name: Hyper-Casual Hentai
About the game: Uncover 15 uncensored images by solving puzzles to remove blockers! Solve the puzzles by coloring the maze with your ball! The ball doesn't stop or change direction until it hits a wall. Use your arrow keys to launch the ball in a direction! There is no time limit or max moves, just relax and have fun! But be careful, sometimes your first move has to be strategic. Each solved puzzle removes a blocked portion of your image, revealing some juicy Hentai underneath! Worried about having to solve all the images just to see an image that interests you? You can work on any of the images at any time! Feel like jumping around? Go ahead! Having trouble with a puzzle? Take a break and work on another image! Each image has one portion visible to give you a little idea of what is hidden away. Pop 20 hidden sloths throughout the puzzles to unlock achievements! Features 15 Uncensored Images 165 Relaxing Puzzles 69 Achievements Fun Puzzle Gameplay Gallery of your Unlocked Images 20 Hidden Sloth Achievements Relaxing Music Partial Controller Support
